  • Constructor Details

    • TopBottomGraph

      public TopBottomGraph(int width, int height)
      Creates an image of type TYPE_INT_ARGB of size width x height.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the image.
      height - The height of the image.

  • Method Details

    • plot

      public void plot(int bottom, int top)
      Plot two graphs. One along the top of the image and one along the bottom. Note that top + bottom should not exceed the hight of the graph. Also note that the value is the distance from the top or bottom. Thus, if bot are set to 0, the graph plots a point along the top and bottom of the graph. It's a good hack to make one line go away.
      Parameters:
      bottom - The bottom point.
      top - The top point.

    • plot

      public void plot(float bottom, float top)
      Plot the percentages on this graph.
      Parameters:
      bottom - The percentage from the bottom of the graph.
      top - The percentage from the top of the graph.

    • plotDelta

      public void plotDelta(int dbottom, int dtop)
      Plot given the differences between the values instead of the absolute values.
      Parameters:
      dbottom - Change from the previous bottom.
      dtop - Change from the previous top.

    • plotDelta

      public void plotDelta(float dbottom, float dtop)
      Plot given the differences in percentages of the total height. The plotted data is computed as new_value = previous_value + graph_height * delta_percentage.
      Parameters:
      dbottom - Change from the previous bottom.
      dtop - Change from the previous top.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] argv)
      This is for testing but we can pull it out later when we are comfy with it.
      Parameters:
      argv - Arguments.

    • setTopColor

      public void setTopColor(Color c)
      Parameters:
      c - Set the color of the top graph to this.

    • setBottomColor

      public void setBottomColor(Color c)
      Parameters:
      c - Set the color of the bottom graph to this.

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor(Color c)
      Parameters:
      c - Set the color of the background of the graph to this.

    • setMarkerColor

      public void setMarkerColor(Color c)
      Parameters:
      c - Set the color of the marker line which shows the front of the graph to this.

    • getOffset

      public int getOffset()
      Get the offset in the graph from the y axis of the image. This is useful if a user wants to only repaint a section of the graph.
      Returns:
      The offset.

    • setOffset

      public void setOffset(int o)
      Set the offset of the graph. If o is < -1 or >= the width it is set to -1.
      Parameters:
      o - The offset.
